Message:
At the end of the long nightmare,
I was invited to Master’s estate.

With him, there’s a chance
I’ll discover a way to turn
those cursed creatures—
And a chance that this time...

I’ll be able to properly protect
the one I serve until the very end.

Which is why, Professor,
I’ll be taking a temporary
leave from work.
And once all has been taken care of,

I do hope then you’ll drink that tea
I prepared for you...
